description.long: Just an average looking dude.
White-fisted holding the knife, he looks ready to strike at any moment.
An evil looking dude.
description.short: Somehow uglier than last time you checked.

description.long: Lying on the floor, barely breathing.
a sharp, serrated hunting knife with a worn, yellow handle.
a sharp, serrated hunting knife with a worn, yellow handle.
a sharp, serrated hunting knife with a worn, yellow handle.

a brown, leather-bound book with some sort of archaic logo wrapping the entire cover.
The gold letters on the front spell out 'THE CIRCLES - A GUIDE BOOK'.

Initially blank, words start to appear as you flip to the first page.
The word 'LIMBO' appears in large, purple letters at the top of the page.

'Welcome to Limbo, where the souls of those not clensed of sin during their life are not granted entrance to the glorious afterlife.

It is here they will spend the rest of their days - but not you.

Continue deeper - if you dare.'
description.short:
'Welcome to Limbo, where the souls of those not clensed of sin during their life are not granted entrance to the glorious afterlife.

It is here they will spend the rest of their days - but not you.

Continue deeper - if you dare.'

description.long:
You awake to find yourself in a large room filled with fog.
You cannot recall how you got here, or what has happened leading up to this moment.
In sections where the walls are visible, images of forelorn individuals are seen wandering too and fro, with no specific destination.
description.short: A foggy room with images of hopeless souls wandering on the walls.

description.long:
A foggy room with images of hopeless souls wandering on the walls.
The letter 'E' is scratched onto the floor underneath where the book used to be.
description.short:
A foggy room with images of hopeless souls wandering on the walls.
The letter 'E' is scratched onto the floor underneath where the book used to be.

description.long:
The fog clears as you enter the next room, and you let out an audible *GASP* !!
All along the eastern and western walls, nude images of individuals in every form of compromising position can be seen.
Not to be outdone by the rooms' surroundings, splayed across the floor is an uncomfortable amount of erotic magazines.
Perhaps it's time to consult the guidebook again.
description.short: The room is filled with an embarassing amount of erotica. Perhaps the guidebook can suggest why.

description.long: Where heaps of pornography previously lay, the letter 'M' is now seen carved into the floor.
description.short: The letter 'M' is carved into the floor.

description.long:
As you enter the next room, you are immediately overtaken by the overpowering stench of animal flesh.
There is a picnic blanket in the center of the room, supporting a large spread of various meats.
description.short: A small room with a picnic blanket in the center, supporting a large plate of food.

description.long: A now-empty room, the food it previously contained now entirely in your stomach. The letter 'E' is carved into the floor.
description.short: An empty room formally containing food. The letter 'E' is carved into the floor.

magazine.description_success:
You ruffle through the magazines and choose one that seems slightly more tasteful than the others.
As you pick up the magazine, a small key falls to the floor.

key.description_success:
You pick up the key and put it in your pocket.
Somehow, where a swath of erotica used to be, you now see a letter 'M' scratched into the floor.
A path to the north now appears to be available.

book.description_success:
You grab the leather-bound book and stache it in your pack.
Underneath where the book used to be, you see a letter 'E' scratched into the floor.
Through the fog, you can now see a path forward to the north.

knife.description_success: You pick up the serrated knife, storing it safely in your belt.

meat.description_success: You stuff as much of the meat into your pack as it will carry.

bread.description_success: You break the bread into small enough chunks to fit into your pack.

cheese.description_success: You stack the cheeses and place it carefully in your pack.

grapes.description_success: You empty the bowl of grapes into your pack.

chocolate.description_success: You scoop as much of the chocolate into your pack as you can carry.

magazine.description_success: You drop the less-than-tasteful dirty magazine to the floor.

key.description_success: You set the key down on the floor.

book.description_success: You should probably hold onto this.

knife.description_success: You drop the knife to the ground, making a loud thunk.

meat.description_success: You empty the meat onto the floor.

bread.description_success: You drop the now-crumbled bread onto the floor.

cheese.description_success: You place the cheeses delicately onto the floor.

grapes.description_success: You pile the grapes up in the corner of the room.

chocolate.description_success: You remove the slightly melted chocolate and place it on the floor.

knife.description_success: You remove the knife from your belt and hold it firmly in your dominant hand.

book.description_success: You nibble the corner, but realize the book is probably more useful un-eaten.

knife.description_success: That just seems like a bad idea.

meat.description_success:
You feast on the meat's flesh, ripping at it with your teeth. It's delicious. Somehow you find room in your stomach to eat it all.
When you look down, you notice a loaf of bread has appeared where the meat had originally stood.

bread.description_success:
You grab fistfulls of the bread and stuff it in your mouth, barely waiting to swallow before cramming in more. It's incredibly filling, but you manage to eat the whole loaf.
You swear it was not there before, but suddently a large selection of cheeses has taken the place where the bread had been.

cheese.description_success:
You proceed to take a bite out of each of the cheeses, each one richer and more decadent than the last. Bite after bite until you realize nothing is left but the crumbs.
Once again, like magic, a bowl of grapes appears where the cheese had once been.

grapes.description_success:
You start popping grapes into your mouth and they burst with flavour. The juices are complex, vibrant, and you can't stop yourself from eating every last one.
Right on cue, the bowl that had contained the grapes had transformed into a large pile of decadent chocolates.

chocolate.description_success:
You take the tiniest bite of the corner of a piece of chocolate. It's heavenly. The sugar rush fills you with a wave of giddiness. You don't want this feeling to stop. You take another bite, and another, until you look down and see only sticky fingers remaining.
No more food emerges in the chocolate's place - instead, you now notice the letter 'E' is carved into the ground.
You feel ill and ready to burst, but it seems like the path forward is now clear.
